entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Dryden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:57 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dryden Airport 01:16 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.2°C
Wind: ENE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets this evening and after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Overcast. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Overcast. Risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
